name: Phlow
description:
Phlow - Plankton Endless Runner

A game created for Bear Jams Fall 2019. 

Control a plankton traversing the ocean. Collect food to evolve and become faster. Compete for the highest score.

Created by Alston Chan, Ethan Lee, Jamie Ip, Jonas Ong, Trevina Tan

All art, sound, and music created by Jamie Ip
